articles.author: Hilary Brueck
articles.title: Early signs Europe, US entering new wave of Covid-19 - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Cases and hospitalisations are rising in Europe, and the US will likely be next. The new boosters fight against the variant that is circulating now.
articles.content:
If you're in the US, it's time to get a Covid vaccine booster shot, experts say.
There are early warning signals in the US and in Europe that we are entering a winter wave of Covid-19 infections, ep… [+2368 chars]

articles.title: Covid wave looms in Europe as booster campaign makes slow start - CNN
articles.description: A new Covid-19 wave appears to be brewing in Europe as cooler weather arrives, with public health experts warning that vaccine fatigue and confusion over types of shots available will likely limit booster uptake.
